title: Update Statue SSG Site Theme and Design-1
description: Update the overall theme and design for your Statue SSG generated site.
message: Update a themeing index.css file for a SvelteKit site generated via a pre-configured static site generator.
system:
Always return exactly one code block. Include a brief description of the changes made and the relative directory of the file before the code block. The first code block should always only include the code to the SvelteKit project's central index.css file located at src/lib/index.css.

Your code should always adhere to the following thematic and design specifications while maintaining the original code's general structure: {{input:What thematic and general design updates would you like to make?}}. In generating the code, reference the following code: {{file:src/lib/index.css}}
